Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)

Effect: Grasp of Droskar.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on all Athletics checks.

Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.name: Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight
Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Perception check to Seek or skill check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.name: Effect: Greater Healer's Gel
Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.description: You gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Effect: Orchestral Brooch.name: Effect: Orchestral Brooch
Effect: Orchestral Brooch.description: You receive a +1 status bonus to your Performance check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Parry.name: Effect: Parry
Effect: Parry.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Phoenix Flask.name: Effect: Phoenix Flask
Effect: Phoenix Flask.description: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).

Effect: Potency Crystal.name: Effect: Potency Crystal
Effect: Potency Crystal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ZCsksGf6NPUKz2Uw]{Potency Crystal}

The weapon becomes a +1 striking weapon for the rest of the turn, gaining a +1 item bonus to the attack roll and increasing the damage on a hit to two weapon damage dice.

Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes.name: Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes
Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes.description: For 1 minute after drinking this potion, you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to hear. In addition, each time you Seek, your hearing becomes a precise sense until the beginning of your next turn, allowing you to pinpoint creatures' locations and otherwise perceive the world in detail by listening to the sound of echoes.

Effect: Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +2 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +3 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.name: Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Crafting)
Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.description: The workshop is stocked with mundane tools and can be used to Craft items appropriate to the workshop with a +1 item bonus, but you must supply any raw materials.

Effect: Protective Barrier.name: Effect: Protective Barrier
Effect: Protective Barrier.description:
Granted by Vontho's Golden Bridge

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +2 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Rhino Shot.description: On a successful Strike, the attack deals an additional 2d6 force damage, and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.description: Whenever you are in exploration mode, roll a separate Search activity check with a +1 status bonus; this does not affect your Speed. If the check succeeds, a fox appears to inform you of this discovery as best as it can, although it cannot speak.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.description: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).description: You animate the silkspinner's shield. Eight spider legs sprout from the shield's rim, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Skyrider Sword.name: Effect: Skyrider Sword
Effect: Skyrider Sword.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).name: Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater)
Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Soulspark Candle.name: Effect: Soulspark Candle
Effect: Soulspark Candle.description: Worshippers of Pharasma gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks. Undead creatures and worshippers of Urgathoa within this area take a –3 status penalty to those checks..

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

Effect: Spined Shield Spines.name: Effect: Spined Shield Spines
Effect: Spined Shield Spines.description: When you use the Shield Block reaction with this shield, the spines take the damage before the shield itself does. When the shield would take damage (after applying Hardness), one spine snaps off per 6 damage, reducing the damage by 6.

Effect: Static Snare.name: Effect: Static Snare
Effect: Static Snare.description: The target takes a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.

Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).name: Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success)
Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.4F87PHMIzLHOUABL]{Stonethroat Ammunition}

The ammunition lodges itself loosely into the target's throat. For 1 round, the target takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls with its jaws or fangs, and to Athletics checks.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.qwCefJjr7AJSqYay]{Succubus Kiss}

The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.qwCefJjr7AJSqYay]{Succubus Kiss}

The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.name: Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration
Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.description:
On a failure, you and all creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:31] save or be overcome with frustration at how you can't follow the simple, easy-to-understand diagrams for assembling the armoire, imposing a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 hour.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).name: Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)
Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).description: On a hit (but not a critical hit), the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General).name: Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General)
Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General).description: The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.

Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).name: Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero)
Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).description: The Hero grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with bows for 1 minute.

Effect: Tallowheart Mass.name: Effect: Tallowheart Mass
Effect: Tallowheart Mass.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DsZ48n6mn8uW5EIP]{Tallowheart Mass}

You gain resistance 10 to fire damage.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 28.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 17.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.BxJNWWvpxacDIsdt]{Tanglefoot Bag (Major)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -20-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 37.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 19.

Effect: Topology Protoplasm.name: Effect: Topology Protoplasm
Effect: Topology Protoplasm.description: In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor.name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.lN3Fn9AuNcKbXucJ]{Trinity Geode}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 1 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5W86t6I92rRNSmwR]{Trinity Geode (Greater)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 3 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.2sr23ZSpplB1oBHd]{Trinity Geode (Major)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon.name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.lN3Fn9AuNcKbXucJ]{Trinity Geode}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5W86t6I92rRNSmwR]{Trinity Geode (Greater)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.2sr23ZSpplB1oBHd]{Trinity Geode (Major)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.name: Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement
Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.description: The creatures gains a +4 status bonus to Deceptions checks to pass as their chosen age, and can add their level to this check as a proficiency bonus if untrained.

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.name: Effect: Wand of Fey Flames
Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).name: 效果: 上等战争之血突变药剂 War Blood Mutagen (Major)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Qa4qjxk5aPzx7HTR]{上等战争之血突变药剂 War Blood Mutagen (Major)}

你使用这件武器的攻击骰和对抗恐惧效果的意志豁免中获得+4物品加值。

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major.name: 效果: 上等放血弹药 Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major)
Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major.description: 在你用启动的放血弹药对一个生物造成伤害后的1分钟内，该生物获得对持续流血伤害的5点弱点。此外在过程中，终止持续流血伤害的任何纯骰检定的DC都从15增加到17（在接受特别有效的帮助时从10增加到12）。

Effect: Elixir of Life (Major).name: 效果: 上等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Major)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Major).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.AmxSqEoFhRLMYd1W]{上等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Major)}

执行效果：

  • 在对抗疾病和毒素的豁免检定上获得+3物品加值。

未执行效果:

  • 恢复[[/r {8d6+21}[healing]]]{8d6+21点生命值}

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).name: 效果: 上等能量突变药剂 Energy Mutagen (Major)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).description:
好处 你获得药剂同步的能量类型的20点抗力。当你使用近战武器击中对手时，将与同步的能量类型相同的[[/r 2d6]]伤害加在其上。

缺陷 你获得其他3种能量类型的弱点5。

Effect: Frost Vial (Major).name: 效果: 上等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Major)
Effect: Frost Vial (Major).description: 生物在速度上承受-15尺的状态减值，直到它的下一回合结束为止.

Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Major).name: 效果: 上等驱虫药剂 Vermin Repellent Agent (Major)
Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Major).description: 效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.C6v5p0ZtIUroYlU2]{上等驱虫药剂 Vermin Repellent Agent (Major)}

Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor).name: 效果: 下等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Minor)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{下等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Minor)}

执行效果：

  • 在对抗疾病和毒素的豁免检定上获得+1物品加值。

未执行效果:

  • 恢复[[/r {1d6}[healing]]]{1d6点生命值}

Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate).name: 效果: 中等六指灵药 Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)
Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ieVRS2BjiWqauly6]{中等六指灵药 Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)}

自动化效果:

  • 获得20尺攀爬速度

Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate).name: 效果: 中等怀疑者灵药 Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)
Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate).description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.xGmX6Vuuhivyal8v]{中等怀疑者灵药 Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)}

持续时间 10分钟

启动 1 交互

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: 在启动过程中，这种弹药的多个组分结合，散发出强烈的气味。被启动的芳香弹药击中的生物会散发出明显的气味长达1小时或直到洗掉这种气味（至少需要一加仑的水和10分钟的擦洗）。任何30尺以内的生物都能闻到目标，即使是那些嗅觉不好的生物也能探测到它的存在，而且只要受影响的生物还存在着气味，所有生物都能在对它的追踪Track中获得+1物品加值。具有作为精准感官或模糊感官的嗅觉的生物，在使用嗅觉探测目标时，范围是正常范围的两倍。
